name: Bull Market 2025
description: Chinese stimulus and supply disruptions drive copper prices to record highs. Navigate 6 months of rising prices, tight supply, and strong Asian demand.

months.name: January
months.description: Rally begins - China announces infrastructure spending

months.name: April
months.description: Acceleration - Prices break through key resistance

months.name: May
months.description: Peak rally - Record highs and premium expansion

objectives: Learn to hedge physical positions with futures
Master the transition from contango to backwardation

excellent.description: Outstanding performance - You've mastered copper trading!

good.description: Good performance - Solid grasp of trading fundamentals
